item.description:
Eight to the Bar opens the summer concert season on June 27

back near the rose arbor -- same place with red balloons

This is a great event that is FREE - we have been coming here as a meet up for over 6 years - we picnic, bring a blanket or chair, food and drink to share and insect repellent. This is rain (Pond House) or shine.

Hope to see you there. The events are every Wed. eve. starting tonightÂ 

http://www.elizabethpark.org/special-events-2012.htm

Nancy

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Eight to the Bar at Elizabeth Park opens the summer concert season
